091FC7AD.Line13.6F0BE: Looking for the town priest. He stopped sending tithes, and I came to find out why.

5A206A1A.Line1.6F0BE: Foolishly, I took shelter in Nevesk and ate their food. You know the rest...

A314412F.Line15.6F0BE: As I neared the village, I sensed darkness around the ruins. I went to investigate. Found the priestâ€™s body... demons...

C929D047.VoiceDir1.6F0BE: Upset with himself for being trusting/naive

F34A6CFC.VoiceDir15.6F0BE: Haunted as he talks about finding the body and demons
